title: Life of a queen
brief_description: A biography of H.M. Queen Elizabeth II. Scenes of her marriage with H.R.H. Prince Philip, of tours in Commonwealth countries, the varied duties undertaken by Her Majesty in the United Kingdom and sequences showing family life with her husband and three children.
